playn.core

Class WatchedAssets

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.WatchedAssets
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assets

    public class WatchedAssets
extends Object
implements Assets
    An Assets wrapper that tracks the loading status of all asynchronously loaded resources.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WatchedAssets(Assets delegate)

    • Method Detail

      • getImageSync

        public final Image getImageSync(String path)
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Synchronously loads and returns an image. The calling thread will block while the image is loaded from disk and decoded. When this call returns, the image's width and height will be valid, and the image can be immediately rendered via layers and into canvases.
        Specified by:
        getImageSync in interface Assets
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the image asset.

      • getImage

        public final Image getImage(String path)
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Asynchronously loads and returns an image. The calling thread will not block. The returned image will not be immediately usable, will not report valid width and height and cannot be immediately rendered into a canvas. The image can be added to an image layer and it will begin rendering as soon as it is loaded. Add a callback to the image to be notified when its loading completes (or fails).
        Specified by:
        getImage in interface Assets
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the image asset.

      • getRemoteImage

        public final Image getRemoteImage(String url)
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Asynchronously loads and returns the image at the specified URL. The width and height of the image will be unset (0) until the image is loaded. Note: on non-HTML platforms, this spawns a new thread for each loaded image. Thus, attempts to load large numbers of remote images simultaneously may result in poor performance.
        Specified by:
        getRemoteImage in interface Assets

      • getRemoteImage

        public final Image getRemoteImage(String url,
                   float width,
                   float height)
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Asynchronously loads and returns the image at the specified URL. The width and height of the image will be the supplied width and height until the image is loaded. Note: on non-HTML platforms, this spawns a new thread for each loaded image. Thus, attempts to load large numbers of remote images simultaneously may result in poor performance.
        Specified by:
        getRemoteImage in interface Assets

      • getSound

        public final Sound getSound(String path)
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Asynchronously loads and returns a short sound effect.

        Note: if a request to play the sound is made before the sound is loaded, it will be noted and the sound will be played when loading has completed.

        Specified by:
        getSound in interface Assets
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the sound resource. NOTE: this should not include a file extension, PlayN will automatically add .mp3, (or .caf on iOS).

      • getMusic

        public final Sound getMusic(String path)
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Asynchronously loads and returns a music resource. On some platforms, the backend will use a different implementation from Assets.getSound(java.lang.String) which is better suited to the much larger size of music audio data.

        Note: if a request to play the sound is made before the sound is loaded, it will be noted and the sound will be played when loading has completed.

        Specified by:
        getMusic in interface Assets
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the sound resource. NOTE: this should not include a file extension, PlayN will automatically add .mp3, (or .caf on iOS).

      • getTextSync

        public String getTextSync(String path)
                   throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Returns a text asset, encoded in UTF-8.
        Specified by:
        getTextSync in interface Assets
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the text asset.
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is an error loading the text (for example, if it does not exist).
        UnsupportedOperationException - on platforms that cannot support synchronous asset loading (e.g. HTML5 and Flash).

      • getText

        public void getText(String path,
           Callback<String> callback)
        Description copied from interface: Assets
        Calls back with a text asset, encoded in UTF-8.
        Specified by:
        getText in interface Assets
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the text asset.

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()
        Return true if all requested assets have been loaded or errored out, or false if there are assets remaining to be retrieved

      • getPendingRequestCount

        public int getPendingRequestCount()
        Return how many assets have not yet been loaded or errored out
